name: Shop Availability
query:
SELECT
    shop.airport AS "Airport:Link/Airport:150",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN shop.status = 'Available' THEN 1 END) AS "Available Shops:Int:150",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN shop.status = 'Leased' THEN 1 END) AS "Occupied Shops:Int:150",
    COUNT(shop.name) AS "Total Shops:Int:150"
FROM
    `tabShop` shop
WHERE
    shop.airport = %(airport)s
GROUP BY
    shop.airport
